li.label: slaver
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] sees nothing wrong with owning a slave or two, and won't mind if something unfortunate happens to one.

li.label: increased toxic resistance
li.description: For some reason [PAWN_nameDef] has developed an increased resistance to toxic buildup. This could be due to working with toxic animals, or in a toxic environment.

li.label: touched by Dagoth Ur
li.description: In a dream [PAWN_nameDef] was greeted by the god of the Sixth House. Ever since then the bells of the Sixth House quitely ring in [PAWN_possessive] ears.

li.label: almalexias blessing
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has received Almalexias blessing. {PAWN_nameDef} knows that even in death, the divine lady is with them.

li.label: hit by bipolar blade
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] suffered a wound by a mysterious blade many years ago. Ever since then something in [PAWN_possessive] head is just a little... off.
